mapper.select: select bbs_no, bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_file from com_board where bbs_state = 1 and 'brd_cd' = 'notice' and 'bbs_exp_sdt' <= now() and 'bbs_exp_edt' > now() and 'section_cd' in('none',#{section_cd}) ORDER BY bbs_ndt DESC
mapper.insert: insert into com_board (bbs_title, bbs_content, bbs_file ) values (#{bbs_title},#{bbs_content},#{bbs_file})
mapper.update: update com_board set bbs_title = #{bbs_title}, bbs_content = #{bbs_content}, bbs_file = #{bbs_file} where bbs_no = #{bbs_no}
